name: Battle of Fate
description:
We're excited to announce that our location-based entertainment (LBE) game has been adapted for online platforms and is now available on Steam. The game was originally designed to be an experience that could only be enjoyed in a specific location, but we've adapted it to be a unique online experience. We've made some minor changes to the game and are releasing it in Early Access, but we'd love to hear your feedback to make it even better. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation, and we look forward to creating new online experiences together!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Embark on a thrilling journey in "Battle of Fate," a gripping first-person PvE shooter where players confront relentless waves of enemies. Navigate through dynamically generated environments featuring randomized maps, weapons, monsters, and items, ensuring each playthrough is a unique and unpredictable experience.

In a world where destinies vary, not all tales unfold with joy. For those burdened with adversity, a chance arises to reshape their narrative. Enter the "Battle of Destiny," where the crucible of death's trials awaits, offering the prospect to carve a fresh and formidable destiny. Are you ready to face the challenges and rewrite your fate?
